disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Darkness Rise.

description.value: Innate: Mordekaiser's basic attacks deal 40% AP bonus magic damage on-hit.

description2.value: Damaging basic abilities or basic attacks on-attack grant 1 stack per enemy champion or large monster hit, up to a maximum of 3. At 3 stacks, Mordekaiser gains Darkness Rise for 4 seconds. Further basic attacks and abilities against enemy champions and large monsters refresh the duration.

description3.value: Darkness Rise: Mordekaiser deals 「 5 − 15.2 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) (+ 1% − 5% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage per second 」「 0.63 − 1.9 (based on level) (+ 3.75% AP) (+ 0.13% − 0.63% (based on level) of target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.125 seconds 」 to all nearby enemies and gains 3% bonus movement speed. The damage against monsters is capped at 28 − 164 (based on level).

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Mordekaiser has a stack counter under his health-bar that is not visible to other champions. Darkness Rise's damage doesn't refresh Darkness Rise's buff. Dead Man's Plate's bonus damage gives one bonus stack for Darkness Rise, even at 0 Momentum stacks.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Obliterate.

description.value: Active: Mordekaiser smashes the area in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit, increased if it hits only one enemy.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Applies spell damage if it hits one target and area damage to multiple targets. Obliterate will cast from wherever Mordekaiser is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Indestructible.

description.value: Passive: Mordekaiser stores 35% of the post-mitigation damage he deals and 15% of the pre-mitigation damage he takes,「 reduced by 75% for non-champion sources 」「 reduced to 8.75% of damage dealt and 3.75% of damage taken for non-champion sources 」, as Potential Shield on his secondary resource bar, up to  30% of his maximum health. The Potential Shield decays by 8 − 25 (based on level) every second after not dealing or taking damage for 1 second, down to a minimum of 5% of his maximum health.

description2.value: Active: Mordekaiser consumes all his current Potential Shield to shield himself for 4 seconds for the same amount. At start the shield decays very slowly but exponentially increases near the end. Indestructible can be recast after 0.5 seconds.

description3.value: Recast: Mordekaiser consumes the remaining shield, healing for a percentage of the amount.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death's Grasp.

description.value: Passive: Mordekaiser gains  magic penetration.

description2.value: Active: Mordekaiser grants sight of the targeted area briefly and, after 0.5 seconds, pulls all enemies within for 250 units, dealing them magic damage.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

notes.value: * Death's Grasp will still pull even if Mordekaiser dies. Death's Grasp is always cast from the original casting position.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Realm of Death.

description.value: Active: Mordekaiser slows the target enemy champion by 75% during the cast time. If the target is still in range and targetable by the end of the cast time they're banished together with Mordekaiser to the Death Realm for 7 seconds.

description2.value: Units between realms see each other as spirits, considering each other dead and negating any interactions between the two. Only the target and Mordekaiser will enter the realm; other champions cannot follow them. Everything that occurs inside the Death Realm is hidden, and all non-champion pets still inside are killed at the end.

description3.value: For the same duration, Mordekaiser also reduces the target's current  attack damage,  ability power,  total attack speed,  maximum health,  armor,  magic resist, and size by 10%, in addition to gaining them for himself. If the target dies while inside, Mordekaiser keeps their partial stats until they respawn.

description4.value: If one of the two affected champions leave the Death Realm, because of having died or having it dispelled, the other will do so as well, but the stats will remain stolen for the full duration.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: Ally Spirit Enemy Spirit The ability will cancel and go on cooldown after the cast time if: The target is displacement immune, crowd control immune or protected by a spell shield. Mordekaiser targets a clone or Sion's Glory in Death. The ability will cancel but will not go on cooldown if: Mordekaiser loses sight of the target. The target is too far away. The target becomes untargetable. Mordekaiser or the target dies. Spell shield will not block the initial slow. If the target's  health is lower than the amount that should be stolen, they will be brought down to 1 health. Mordekaiser will still get the usual amount of maximum health. Unlike the other stats, Mordekaiser does not steal enemy total size; instead he gains 10% of his own size and reduces the enemy's size by 10% of theirs (all size modifiers stack additively). Mordekaiser grows in size over 0.25 seconds after successfully stealing his targets' stats, and shrinks over 0.25 seconds after the buff runs out again. The target shrinks over 0.25 seconds after their stats are stolen, but grows back to normal size instantly when the effect ends. The transition in and out of the Death Realm doesn't interrupt channels. The boundaries are not considered terrain ( Unstoppable Onslaught exception), and enemies that try to move out of the area will be displaced back inside. Dashes, blinks, displacements and other forms of movement will cap their effect range to the boundary. Targets will stop at the boundary even after it expired. Multiple Death Realms (possible through a hijacked Realm of Death or if multiple Mordekaisers are in the same match) spawned will exist in the same dimension, allowing champions to see and interact with champions bound to other circles. Champions are only affected by their boundaries and are not able to see the others. Tahm Kench's Devour can carry a target outside of their circle, but they will be displaced back inside once Regurgitated. An active Assault and Battery on a target outside the perimeter will cause Vi to continue her charge until her circle ends. She can knock back and damage secondary targets multiple times. Realm of Death will not be dispelled if either of the two affected champions enter resurrection after taking lethal damage. It is dispelled if the target enters a zombie state. Realm of Death can be dispelled (excluding death and duration) if: The target uses a cleansing effect, with the exceptions of Cleanse, Mikael's Crucible, and Kled's Dismount. Yone's Soul Unbound recast is disabled while he is in the Realm of Death. Mordekaiser or the target cast another Realm of Death. The affected champions will remain stuck for the duration of the new circle. Any active tether effects (both friendly and hostile ones) existing on either of the two champions entering the realm will be broken (unless the tether is between those two). Structures exist in all realms at the same time. Turrets will target normally as if all units were in the same realm. The allied health, resource, and ultimate indicators (champion portraits located on the screen) will not update between realms as the players have no vision of them. Realm of Death's interactions with other elements/abilities: Brushes will maintain their presence between realms. Switching realms detaches all attached champions on either of the two champions entering the realm. The Hextech Ultimatum, catching a Spinning Axe, Timewinder, Parallel Convergence, Null Zone, Twisted Advance, Pix, Worked Grounds, Gravity Field, Satchel Charge, Rift Scuttler's Speed Shrine, Statikk Shiv and gaining Zeke's Convergence area of effect are exceptions and may still take effect between dimensions. Effects such as Requiem, Absolute Zero, Grand Starfall and Final Spark will only deal damage to enemies of the dimension they're in at time of cast. Ending the channel or cast time while inside another dimension will not do damage to nearby enemies. Shuriken Flip may be re-cast inside the Death Realm even if its target is outside it, but Akali will stop dashing upon colliding with the boundary. Fear Beyond Death may not be re-cast while his victim is not in the same realm as him, but an already chained foe will still continue to be reeled in and executed. The fear is cast in the realm Urgot is in. Void Shift dispels from Realm of Death's slow, making it vulnerable to the Death Realm. Ball will instantly return back to Orianna if she's sent to another dimension. Eye of the Herald and Teleport are disabled while in the Realm of Death. Controllable pets and decoys can still be commanded between realms. Jungle plants ( Blast Cone, Honeyfruit, Scryer's Bloom) will not take presence between realms. PENDING FOR TEST: Tahm Kench Devours the target affected by Death Realm before it ends. Nocturne's Paranoia only applies nearsight to enemy champions in the same dimension as him. The player's screen will still change in color however. Type Cast time Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death, unless protected by Resurrection
